DynACof 1.0.1

Continuous percentage of living tissue distribution

Paliv_dis.Rd

Help compute the percentage of living tissue in organs according to age

Paliv_dis(Age_Max, P_Start, P_End, k)

Arguments

Age_Max

Maximum age of the organ (year)
P_Start

Percentage of living tissue at first age (% of dry mass)
P_End

Percentage of living tissue at last age (% of dry mass)
k

Rate between P_Start and P_End

Value

Living tissue at each age

(In % of organ dry mass)

Details

The percentage of living tissue is computed as follows: $$P_End+((P_Start-P_End)*exp(seq(0,-k,length.out = Age_Max)))$$

Examples

Paliv_dis(40,1,0.05,5)
#>    Age PaliveStem_Tree
#> 1    1           1.000
#> 2    2           0.886
#> 3    3           0.785
#> 4    4           0.697
#> 5    5           0.619
#> 6    6           0.550
